name: 李穎玟
objective: The class topics include 1.Motion  2.Force 3.Kinetic energy 4. Work 5. Conservation of energy 6. Momentum
schedule:
12-Sep　　Introduction 
19-Sep　　Measurement
26-Sep　　Motion along a straight line
3-Oct　　Motion in Two and Three Dimensions (I)
10-Oct   Motion in Two and Three Dimensions (II)
17-Oct　　Force and Motion (I)
24-Oct　　Force and Motion (II)
1-Nov   Kinetic Energy (I)
7-Nov　　Midterm
14-Nov　　Kinetic Energy (II)
21-Nov　　Work (I)
28-Nov　　 Work (II)
5-Dec　　 Potential Energy and Conservation of Energy (I)
12-Dec　　 Potential Energy and Conservation of Energy (II)
19-Dec　　 Center of Mass and Linear Momentum (I)
26-Dec　　 Center of Mass and Linear Momentum (II)
9-Jan　　Final
materials:
Textbook:
Essential University Physics/ Wolfson, Richard/ 4th Edition
remarks: 本學期原則採實體授課方式； 因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準： (https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw)
